titleStmt.title: SII 7.143: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 143. (A.R. No. 130 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇara Urimaaiyil ciṟan=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi villavar nilaikeṭa minavar kulaitara Ēnaaimannavar Iriyaluṟ ṟiḻitara tikkaṉaittu n=ta
ṉc cakkara naṭātti vicaiyābhiṣekam paṇṇi virasiṁhāsanattu Avanimuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷiya cakravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu muppattiraṇṭāvatu milāṭākiya jananātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaik
kūṟṟattut tirukkovalūrāṉa śrīmaturan=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalattut tiruviṭaikaḻiĀḻvāṉ koyilil Eḻun=taruḷina maṇavāḷāḻvāṉaiyum pirāṭṭiyaiyum jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭu
kkoṭṭattu ciyapuranāṭṭu Aḷakūr vijaiyanalluḻāṉ ciriḷaṅkopperiyaveḷāṉ viṇṇappañ ceytu Amutuceytaruḷa niman=tañ ceytapaṭi nāḷ 1kkut tirupponakap paḻavarici patakkukkunellu Ayṅkuṟuṇi
yūm kaṟiyamutukku nānāḻiyum Uppamutukku nāḻiyūm miḷakamutukku nānāḻiyūm neyyamutu Uḻakkāḻākkukku kuṟiṇi nānāḻiyum tayiramutu Irunāḻikku nānāḻiyum Aṭaikkāyamutu patiṉāṟukkum Ilaiyamutu nāṟpatukkum nellu mu
ṉnāḻiyum Āka nāḷ Oṉṟukku nellu Irutūṇi muṉṉāḻiyum Ulakaḷan=tāṉmarakkāllāl celvitākavum nāḷ Oṉṟukk=kuc can=taṉakkāppu Araikkaḻañcum Iṉnellum celkaikku Ipperiyaveḷāṉ ceyvitta tiruna
n=tavānam rājentracoḻanil kamukum teṅkum koṇṭu celvitāka niman=taṅkaṭṭi
Digital edition of SII 7.143 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
